name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Engineer with a robust background in cloud-native application development and microservices, leveraging extensive experience with **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP** for scalable solutions. Proficient in container orchestration using **Kubernetes** and building custom controllers with **Controller-Runtime** and **Kubebuilder**, alongside infrastructure management through **Crossplane**. With 10+ years as a Full Stack Developer, I excel in creating high-performance software solutions within healthcare and finance. My technical expertise includes **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and mobile development with **Flutter**, complemented by hands-on experience in frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Additionally, I have a strong foundation in MLOps, employing tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for managing ML pipelines and workflows. I am dedicated to building secure, maintainable solutions that adhere to compliance standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, while focusing on delivering impactful systems.
